com.jmr.wrapperx.server

Class HttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapperx.server.HttpServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProtocol

    public class HttpServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IProtocol
    Networking Library HttpServer.java Purpose: HTTP server used by the servlet. Waits for incoming clients and stores encryption and configuration information. Singleton object because there can only be one HTTP server running in each application.
    Version:
    1.0 8/4/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private IEncryptor encryptionMethod
      The type of encryption to use when sending objects over HTTP protocol.

      Singleton instance of the server.

      private java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService mainExecutor

      The server configurations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private HttpServer()
      Starts a new HTTP server with the default settings.
